reviews.review: графика хорошая убийц и выживших очень много класс советую всем

Gra jest naprawdę dobrze skonstruowana i zbalansowana, cena jest moim zdaniem adekwatna to zawartości, być może i nie są to już klimaty z 2016 roku gdy gra posiadała naprawdę dobry klimat jednak w takiej postaci jest ona i tak bardzo dobra więc oceniam ją bardzo mocno pozytywnie oraz życzę dalszych sukcesów oraz  rozwoju w dobrą stronę :)
Its a nice game with skill changing gameplay :)
great game with minor details that need to be fixed      7-8/10
Highly recommend it to spend your free time.

es un juego muy bueno para mi, y puede ser mejor si a el volvieran la movilidad del superviviente en el 2016  por que ahora solo vas de palet en palet, ventana en ventana y cuando ya no te quedan esos 2 a lo que recurrias antes era a los 360 que no estaban tan aniquilados como los de ahora, pero el juego es entretenido
Otimo joguinho , mt mt mt bom com amigos

If you are good at the game or understand its fundamentals it will be really fun, the reason for the negative reviews are mostly bad hitboxes or just toxic players showing no mercy to new ones. Get good fast and its a really fun game
nice to play alone or with friends
Great game.Too bad u wait ages to play as killer....hope they fix it

Esse jogo é muito bom pra jogar com os amigos !!!
Aguaaante el dbd no me importa nada
well i like when people are angry and i see them often here sooooooooooooooo

Honestly, this game is incredible. While simple on the surface, the inner workings of this game are slowly laid bare as you get more and more experience and create incredible replayability; especially over time as they add more perks, survivors, killers, and maps!
после 1000 часов игры до сих пор играю но есть минусы в плане проработки хитов и других вещей,но в общем игра топовая.

Its a fun game with regular updates and new killers that keeps things interesting.
But do not be surprised if you find bugs... There is a lot of bugs
Oyun güzel takım arkadaşlarınızla keyifli ama Oyunun Has ... ları tarafından Zehir edilinilebiliniyor.
Probably one of the best games to play with your mates
這個遊戲的氣氛營造做得很好，不管是場景還是音效都很有恐怖的氣氛，雖然bug很多依然是這個遊戲的大缺陷，而且教學做得不太好，例如：沒有教導新手不要任意拔鉤、記得掙扎為隊友爭取時間等，非常重要的基本觀念，一旦克服了一開始的撞牆期後，這遊戲就有趣多了。原本我不會推薦這個遊戲的，但dedicated server上線後遊戲體驗好非常多，幾乎不會lag了!! 我認為值得推薦

Если есть желание: помыть посуду, полы, потолки, кота, окна, наладить личную жизнь, устроится на работу и закрыть долги по учебе - то эта игра для вас! 
Играть за выжившего - значит в каждом матче получать по хребту, висеть на кукане, пытаться чинить чертовы генераторы.
Играть за маньяка - ага, счаз, ты сначала подожди вечность, чтобы просто создать лобби и найти игроков.

even though the game is pretty fun for me there are massive balancing issues server problems  and a toxic community I could never recommend a game in such a state people who would like to buy the game should just wait until the issues are finally fixed because at the moment its more of a queue simulator than a real game
Very enjoyable. Even better with friends. Many perks are cancerous
Das ist einer der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe

This Game is the most addictive game if u actually play it with friends and try your best to understand the game :D Love you Dbd ' I Think we did a pretty good job' and there are still some glitches Lel Still much love :D <3
I hate myself now 4/10, you should all play it its great
Лучшая игра про маньяков, спасибо разработчики

ИГРА КОНЕЧНО КЛАССНАЯ, НО ОТ ТОГО, ЧТО МАНЫ БЬЮТ ЧЕРЕЗ СТЕНЫ И ОКНА, КОГДА ТЫ НАХОДИШЬСЯ В КИЛОМЕТРЕ ОТ НИХ, ИНОГДА БОМБИТ)
muito bom o game! o cara da risada em vez de se estressar...
świetna gra,świetnie przemyślana można grać całymi dniami

Great game, really fun, even more so with friends. 
Stick with playing as the survivor, running and hiding for your life, deciding when is safe to grab a generator or help one of the other survivors, abandon other survivors to their deaths to finish a generator, whatever floats your boat.... or, you could stalk the survivors from afar, giving them false hope, before chasing them down and using them as bait to delay the work on the generators. Just dont camp. It ruins the fun for everyone.
Одна из лучших Многопользовательских игр за последние несколько лет, которая, уж поверьте, вам никогда НЕ НАДОЕСТ! Берите, не пожалеете!)))
This game is really fun if you play with friends
adoro o jogo a empresa é bem atenciosa com ele e isso é uma das coisas que mais importa pra mim
